name: Free Pine Man Postcard
description:
Create your own pine, which if you want someone you can give now. Choose a pine, will be completed with a background of many elements: hands, feet, animal body parts, jewel, sports equipment, musical instruments and many other items that await additional user.
When your pine man is ready, add a personal message, save it and send it by e-mail or put public facebook page. In the payed version available much more items.
